Description: SalesPad was designed by distributors with day-to-day operations in mind. Gone are the days of ERP that catered solely to the accounting crowd.
Name: SalesPad

Methods.Name: Search Customers by Name
Methods.Description: Get a list of customer records with match by name.

Methods.Name: Create Customer And Address
Methods.Description: Create a customer with address in Salespad.

Methods.Name: Create Customer
Methods.Description: Create a customer in Salespad.

Methods.Name: List Updated Customers
Methods.Description: Returns a list of customers that have been modified since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Get Customer By Customer Number.

Methods.Name: Search Customers
Methods.Description: Search customer records using OData filtering.

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: Get a list of customer records.

Methods.Name: Create Customer Number
Methods.Description: Create a new unique Customer Number for a new Customer based on their name.

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Update a SalesPad customer.

Methods.Name: Find Addresses  by Zip Code
Methods.Description: Finds Addresses matching the supplied Zip Code.

Methods.Name: List Customer Address Codes
Methods.Description: Get Customer Address Codes.

Methods.Name: Get Customer Address
Methods.Description: Get a customers address record.

Methods.Name: Search Addresses
Methods.Description: Search address records using OData filtering.

Methods.Name: Update Customer Address
Methods.Description: Update a customer address.  Add custom fields in the following format: userfields.fieldname - for example userfields.XDealerCode

Methods.Name: Create Customer Address
Methods.Description: Creates a customer address. Add custom fields in the following format: userfields.fieldname - for example userfields.XDealerCode

Methods.Name: Copy Item
Methods.Description: Copy existing Item to new Item and update from ItemMaster body before saving.

Methods.Name: Create Item
Methods.Description: Creates an item record.

Methods.Name: Update Item
Methods.Description: Updates an item record.

Methods.Name: List Items
Methods.Description: Get item records.

Methods.Name: Get Item
Methods.Description: Get an item record.

Methods.Name: List Sales Documents
Methods.Description: List sales documents.

Methods.Name: Create Sales Document
Methods.Description: Creates a sales document record.

Methods.Name: Get Sales Document
Methods.Description: Get the requested sales documents.

Methods.Name: Update Sales Document
Methods.Description: Updates a sales document record.

Methods.Name: Create Sales Line Item
Methods.Description: Creates a sales line item record.

Methods.Name: Create Sales Document Payment
Methods.Description: Creates a sales document payment record.
